attributes.action: UK place Economic Embargo against Bangladesh & End ALL Financial & Political Support for Bangladesh Government.
attributes.additional_details:
The B.desh Gov has stepped up it's manipulation of the people to try & execute opposition leaders by branding them Pakistani collaborators & is using the public hysteria to persecute, abuse & violate the rights of the opposition supporters, causing mass rioting, violence & even the loss of human life.

As a British Bangladeshi I'm outraged by this latest episode of disgusting behaviour from the B.desh Gov & I don't believe they will change unless serious action is taken.

I believe it is therefore in the best interests for the future of B.desh, that the UK Gov place Sanctions on B.desh by ensuring the temporary but complete severance of ALL economic ties with B.desh & end ALL financial & political support for the B.desh Gov. until the situation improves Significantly.
